div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 344 Carystus, Euboea, 1883 (212) Burial: c. 86 B.C. (T; Lewis) Contents: c. 100 AR Carystus: 20-30 dr. Athens: 70 New Style tetradr. 2-3 New Style dr. Imit. Athens: 3 tetradr. (Ο ΔΕΜΟΣ) Disposition: Meletopoulos 27 Meletopoulos, Parnassos 1883, pp. 774- 6 AJN (1883-4), p. 82 Köhler, ZfN 1885, pp. 103-6 † Thompson, Athens, pp. 444-9, 502-3 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 281
